title: Did J.K. Rowling Drop Off Forbes Billionaires List Due to Charitable Donations?
subtitle: A popular Internet meme says 'Harry Potter' author J.K. Rowling dropped off the Forbes billionaires list because she gave so much money to charity.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Author J.K. Rowling was the first person to fall off of the Forbes billionaires list due to donating so much money to charity.
